titles.title: MP879 Lord, help me to know Your presence

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, help me to know Your presence
in all I do today,
Lord, help me to declare Your praises
in everything I say;
live in my heart
and fill every part
with Your Holy Spirit's flame -
O let the world see Jesus in me,
and glorify Your name!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord, may I become like Jesus
in everything I do:
then, if any action pleases,
glory will come to You.
Lord, may my mind
and will be refined
by Your Holy Spirit's flame -
O let the world see Jesus in me,
and glorify Your name!
